Blog.post: At present this site is currently under construction, whilst we continue to progress testing out the software used for this site.
Oh yes, brillant night Shame nige couldnt be there but he of course has better things to do than see mr ben! But anyhow heres some seriously good pics fromm a brillant night Aww me and my sis.

Wooo hooo its my birthday lucky me hey! Im now the grand old age, off 22 so its really time I better go out and get a real job.. anyhooo im off out to go out and give it some serious large stylee berthday large with mr rory at tabu. nige the bugger, has decided not to come and to go to luton instead... the arse!

well, hey ya dont know much about me so heres a few things you may or maynot wanna know! Name: Mr Ben Age: 23 Gender: male Astrological Sign: Libra Born in the Year of the: Monkey Location: Lowestoft : United Kingdom So there you have it, all ya need to know!
Hiya, and welcome to my first ever blog... I dunno what am gonna come out with on here! You may find it scary! I know I do hehe!
Well, yea Jenna has been and gone to uni interview and she seemd to have had a good time! Well it was another long boring night at work. Hope old Kelly is ok

Ahh again the start of another week, least I have a day off today to chill out and that kinda thing unless the parental units have their way and I will be looking after them all day! Which will be all fun not!
Well, yea Jenna has been and gone to uni interview and she seemd to have had a good time! Well it was another long boring night at work. Hope old Kelly is ok
Welcome to the new look maudlin.co.uk, yes indeedy it has been a while coming but now its finally back wooo hooo! So we welcome all visitors to the site!
test
test
Its Mr Ben's 23rd birthday! So all together now say happy birthday mr ben!
Well miss becky came round and we had our first kiss.... awwwww i know sad hey, but Ive liked her for a good 6 months or so so all is good
well mr ben woke up to find this... aww how much do I love snow, so scenic and stuff, least becky was happy she didnt have to go to college lucky bugger hey!
well it was a seriously seriously large styleeeeeee one... heres a few decent pics from the night..
oh yes its that time of year when mr ben gets a new phone and I have my heart set on a SE Z600 so here it is in all its glory my new fone wooo hoooo!! look! its all sexy and stuff

as ya prolly know, all my fitties died but hey ya have to move on dont you! So anyhow mes got myself a new tank, and some new fitties so in true finding nemo styleee heres my new tank and new fitties.. more pics of fitties too come *fitties = fishies

Well it was extremely good to see my sister, unfortunate we had to say our good byes and stuff.... then the worst bit. The train journey home... of course we were bloody delayed and as mr ben was all worn out jo took a picture of him all aleep!

Well me and Jo ventured to the big apple! London anyhoo to see my ickle sis and to meet her bf that I of course have heard sooo much about but of course never seen. We had a really good time it was good to of course see Jenna, as much as I hate saying that! Grr!! We had a really nice meal in the West End, as Mr Dad and Anna joined us also to see Jenna, and after that we headed around to the Trocodero to play bowling, where I of course won! Ok Ok I lost, and badly! Then it was off back to my sisters, to errm get drunk.... very drunk! Anyhoo heres a few sightseeing pics that Miss Snappy Jo took

You may or may not seen in the news about an American who was bloody beheaded live on a arabic website, ok these ppl say that the beheading of Nick Berg was in retaltion for the ill-treatment of the prisoners at Abu Ghraib. Seriously, these ppl must be taking the piss, ok I wouldnt wanna be pissed on or anything, but to cut somebodies head off. COME ON!!! and to still think there has been more outrage over these apparent "real" pictures of brit soliders abusing prisoners than the beheading of Nick Berg. The world is mad, just mad. My matey today actually sent me the entire video, becasue to an extent ya just cant believe these ppl can do such things, which you can find urlLink here please be warned though this is very graphic. So do not watch unless you are very sure. Very scary times we live in, isnt it.

awww i saw mr dad for the first time in a couple of weeks he came to pick up his usual collection of enterprise episodes. Its a shame I dont see mr dad more often, but then thats life. He also mentioned that jenna really misses me. Mr Ben also really misses Jenna, but we shall keep that between ourselves shall we as she will get a big head or summat!
hmmm just banging out the serious choonies of special d at the mo, so what do you ppl have in your cd players? Woooo Wooooooooooo!

People at work over the last week havent really been nice to miss becky, mainly becasue of stuff she did or didnt do on saturday night. So tonight I decided to tell her what they were saying, perhaps wrong of me I know, but I thought she really needed to know what they were saying about her. Becky hasnt had an easy couple of weeks and kinda got really upset I just wish I could have been there to give her a serious hug.

well some good news outta my beloved teams, relegation to division 1 is we have some new female players yayyyy! and sexy ones at that!!! ok im joking its the new kit launch, defo nicer that the previous one methinks. Larger Version. urlLink kitwallpaper800.jpg
